title: Bertha, The Giant Borer That Broke, May Be Sinking Seattle's Downtown
teaser: The machine, the biggest of its type, was digging a tunnel under the city when it went kaput. To get to and fix Bertha, workers are digging a 12-story pit, which some say is damaging nearby buildings.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
